start.text: You are a detective investigating a cold case. You find a new lead that points to a powerful politician. You can either confront the politician or dig deeper into the case.

confront.text: You confront the politician and he confesses to the crime. You have solved the case!

deeper.text: You dig deeper and uncover a conspiracy that goes all the way to the top. You are in over your head. Your adventure ends here.
